text: Hardenberg is a municipality and city in the province of Overijssel, the Netherlands. About 61,000 people were living there in 2021. It lies at the Vecht river in Salland region and borders both Drenthe province and Germany. == References == * Plaatsengids.nl Category:Cities in Overijssel Category:Municipalities of Overijssel Category:Salland
title: Hardenberg
